title: 1053 3 Morning Routine Changes for a More Successful Day
description:
"Focused, productive, successful mornings generate focused, productive, successful days."

With 2021 being a fresh start for all of us, building a successful morning routine is one of the greatest things you can do for yourself. In this 5-minute Friday, Lewis gives three changes you can make starting now to make the most of your mornings every single day!

For more go to: www.lewishowes.com/1053

The Millionaire Morning: https://www.themillionairemorning.com/

Greatness Coaching www.lewishowes.com/coaching

The Science of Sleep for Ultimate Success with Shawn Stevenson: https://link.chtbl.com/896-pod

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

The Wim Hof Experience: Mindset Training, Power Breathing, and Brotherhood: https://link.chtbl.com/910-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
